ERROR404.TITLE: Sorry, we can’t find that page
ERROR404.SUBTITLE: The link may be outdated or the address might be misspelled.
ERROR404.DESCRIPTION: Double-check the URL, return to the homepage or use the search engine to keep exploring curated clinical evidence.
ERROR404.SEO_DESCRIPTION: The requested page does not exist on NeuroFinder. Head back to continue exploring our clinical evidence search.

ABOUT.TITLE: About NeuroFinder
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: An academic project with a social mission.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: NeuroFinder was created as the Master’s Thesis for the Artificial Intelligence Master’s program at Universidad Internacional de La Rioja (UNIR).
ABOUT.PURPOSE: Our goal is to streamline the search for clinical and scientific information on dementias through a specialised semantic engine.
ABOUT.MOTIVATION: The motivation behind the project is twofold: accelerate evidence discovery for professionals and provide a useful, supportive tool for families and people affected.

HOME.TITLE: NeuroFinder | Clinical dementia search
HOME.DESCRIPTION: NeuroFinder is an advanced search platform specialised in dementia, consolidating clinical, scientific and outreach sources to deliver rigorous, accessible information.

SEARCH.TITLE: Search {{topic}} | NeuroFinder
SEARCH.DESCRIPTION: Explore vetted insights on {{topic}} with NeuroFinder’s semantic engine and access centralised evidence.
